item.title: Using Motorola E6 or A1200 with kannel
item.description: So for all the people who do not want to learn AT commands to get their old MotoRockr [aka motorola e6] and A1200 working with your kannel setup to send/receiveÂ MMS and SMS here is the kannel.conf and modems.conf. The important part is the modems.conf which has the correct AT commands to receive SMSes. kannel.confmodems.conf
